posts.post_content:
@ Haatweels  
Actually, his ability can prevent infect damage, while honor guard doesnt.  
But i agree, he costs way to much to maintain.  
  
Plus this card is way overcosted.  
And the fact that you need another color of mana to prevent damage means that you cant use it nearly as much. It also means that this card would only work with R/W decks.  
  
Way too restrictive.  
  
2/5
